paper_keywords: Linearly coupled recurrently connected neural networks
paper_abstract: In this brief, we study the global synchronization of linearly coupled neural networks with delayed couplings, where the intrinsic systems are recurrently connected neural networks with unbounded time-varying delays, and the couplings include instant couplings and unbounded delayed couplings. The concept of mu-synchronization is introduced. Some sufficient conditions are derived for the global mu-synchronization for the underlined coupled systems.
paper_title: Global mu-Synchronization of Linearly Coupled Unbounded Time-Varying Delayed Neural Networks With Unbounded Delayed Coupling
